title: Is COVID-19 Racist?! | Ep #7 Good Morning MugClub
description: Have you heard that the coronavirus is racist? And do you think bringing race into the discussion of COVID-19 adds anything? Today the team breaks down silly claims that a virus is racist <cough> sickle cell <cough>, AOC's latest incoherent rambling, a "Young Turks" inside baseball story, and the rape allegation against Joe Biden.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
